mapper.select: select a.no,a.title,a.content,a.hit,a.reg_date,a.g_no,a.o_no,a.depth,a.user_no,b.name from board a inner join user b on a.user_no=b.no where a.title like '%${keyword }%' or a.content like '%${keyword }%' or b.name like '%${keyword }%' order by g_no desc,o_no limit #{startOffset },#{size }

choose.when: select count(*) as count from board a inner join user b on a.user_no=b.no
choose.otherwise: select count(*) as count from board a inner join user b on a.user_no=b.no where a.title like '%${keyword }%' or a.content like '%${keyword }%' or b.name like '%${keyword }%'
